text: Perdida is a 2018 Argentina-Spanish drama thriller film directed by Alejandro Montiel. It is based on Argentinian journalist Florence Etcheves’s novel Cornelia. == Plot == A police officer resumes the search for a childhood friend who disappeared years ago. == Cast == * Amaia Salamanca as Cornelia Villalba/Sirena * Luisana Lopilato as Manuela Pelari/Pipa * Mara Alberto as Clara Villalba * Carlos Alcantára as Adalberto * Juan Ignacio Cane as Ariel * Pedro Casablanc as Egipcio * Carlos del Rio as Sacristan * Nicolás Furtado as Seretti * Marina Garré as Micaela * Marta Haller as Vecina Pipa * Micaela Kastan as Young Leonora * Laura Laprida as Leonora * Miguel Angel Maciel as Enfermero Raúl * Mora Magnarelli as Young Cornelia * Arancha Martí as Lucrecia * Mariana Mastracchio as Mucama Leonora == References == ==External links== * Category:2018 films Category:2018 thriller films Category:Argentine films Category:Argentine thriller films Category:Spanish-language Netflix original films Category:Spanish films Category:Spanish thriller films
title: Perdida (2018 film)
